software.name: mightmgw
software.description: Might and Magic - World of Xeen

info.name: alt_title
info.value: ワールド・オブ・ジーン

info.name: usage
info.value: This disk combines MM4 and MM5 into a single game. Requires 4 MB RAM, both CDs and a save disk from either game. Boot TownsOS 2.1 and run the icon on drive A to install.

rom.name: might and magic - world of xeen (install disk).hdm

info.name: usage
info.value: Requires 2 MB RAM. Boot TownsOS 2.1, insert this disk and run the icon on drive A.

info.name: usage
info.value: This is a master disk that can be turned into a System, Data or Demo disk. Make a copy of this disk, boot TownsOS V1.1, run the icon for the type of disk you want, and wait until it returns to the TownsOS GUI.

info.name: usage
info.value: Copy AB2.EXP from the After Burner CD to the floppy disk, then run AB2AGAIN.EXE to patch. Run AB2START.BAT from TownsOS V1.1 to start the patched game.

info.name: usage
info.value: Boot TownsOS V2.1 and run the icon on floppy drive A:

software.name: batfght2
software.description: Battle Fighters 2 - Yume o Kaketa Tatakai

info.name: usage
info.value: Requires 3 MB RAM. Run FB386.EXP from TownsOS V2.1, then load BATTLE_2.BAS from the F-BASIC386 interface, and run the program.

software.name: batfght3
software.description: Battle Fighters 3 - Inishie no Jashin Densetsu

info.name: usage
info.value: Run FB386.EXP from TownsOS V2.1, then load BREAK.BAS from the F-BASIC386 interface, and run the program.
